entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
